Articles.Content: Every time I try to jump to a ship it black screens. 2 Weeks later my KSP would stop loading at around 80%, also black screening. The loading page would only show the loading bar and Module Manager, nothing else. Can someone help? I want to play KSP again......

To pre-empt the mods:

"Please read and follow the instructions in this sticky thread and update your post with the required format and information."

Every time I try to jump to a ship it black screens. 2 Weeks later my KSP would stop loading at around 80%, also black screening. The loading page would only show the loading bar and Module Manager, nothing else. Can someone help? I want to play KSP again......

Yes i know.

1. output log?

2.make sure your mods are updated.

3. If all else fails, redo your mod list (delete all mods and reinstall, fixes "most" problems)
